#include "../deptran/__dep__.h"
#include "server.h"
#include "../deptran/raft/server.h"
#include "client.h"

namespace janus {

static int volatile x1 =
    MarshallDeputy::RegInitializer(MarshallDeputy::CMD_MULTI_STRING,
                                     [] () -> Marshallable* {
                                       return new MultiStringMarshallable;
                                     });

int64_t KvServer::GetNextOpId() {
  verify(sp_log_svr_);
  int64_t ret = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  ret = ret << 32;
  ret = ret + op_id_cnt_++; 
  return ret;
}

int KvServer::Put(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  const string& v) {
  /* 
  Your are recommended to use MultiStringMarshallable as the format 
  for the log entries. Here is an example how you can use it.
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(op_id));
  s->data_.push_back("put");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);
  */
  /* your code here */
  bool isLeader = false;
  uint64_t tempterm;
  GetRaftServer().GetState(&isLeader, &tempterm);
  if(isLeader){
    auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
    s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
    s->data_.push_back("put");
    s->data_.push_back(k);
    s->data_.push_back(v);
    auto sCast = dynamic_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(s);
    oplogids[oid] = 0;
    uint64_t index;
    uint64_t term;
    GetRaftServer().Start(sCast, &index, &term);
    Coroutine::Sleep(600000);
    std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(mtx);
    if (oplogids[oid] == 1) {
      return KV_SUCCESS;
    }
    else{
      oplogids[oid] = -1;
      Log_info("put timed out");


      return KV_TIMEOUT;
    }
  }
  else{
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }
}

int KvServer::Append(const uint64_t& oid, 
                     const string& k,
                     const string& v) {
  /* your code here */  
  bool isLeader = false;
  uint64_t tempterm;
  GetRaftServer().GetState(&isLeader, &tempterm);
  if(isLeader){
    mtx.lock();
    Log_info("in append k = %d | v = %d | oldval = %d", k, v, kvMap[k]);
    auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
    s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
    s->data_.push_back("append");
    s->data_.push_back(k);
    s->data_.push_back(v);
    auto sCast = dynamic_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(s);
    oplogids[oid] = 0;
    uint64_t index;
    uint64_t term;
    GetRaftServer().Start(sCast, &index, &term);
    mtx.unlock();
    Coroutine::Sleep(600000);
    std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(mtx);
    if (oplogids[oid] == 1) {
      return KV_SUCCESS;
    }
    else{
      oplogids[oid] = -1;
      Log_info("append timed out");


      return KV_TIMEOUT;
    }
  }
  else{
    return KV_NOTLEADER; 
  }
}

int KvServer::Get(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  string* v) {
  /* your code here */
  bool isLeader = false;
  uint64_t tempterm;
  GetRaftServer().GetState(&isLeader, &tempterm);
  if(isLeader){
    auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
    s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
    s->data_.push_back("get");
    s->data_.push_back(k);
    auto sCast = dynamic_pointer_cast<Marshallable>(s);
    oplogids[oid] = 0;
    uint64_t index;
    uint64_t term;
    GetRaftServer().Start(sCast, &index, &term);
    Coroutine::Sleep(600000);
    std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(mtx);
    if (oplogids[oid] == 1) {
      *v = kvMap[k];
      return KV_SUCCESS;
    }
    else{
      oplogids[oid] = -1;
      return KV_TIMEOUT;
    }
    
  }
  else{
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }
}

void KvServer::OnNextCommand(Marshallable& m) {
  auto v = (MultiStringMarshallable*)(&m);
  /* your code here */
  std::lock_guard<std::mutex> lock(mtx);
  if((*v).data_[1]=="put"){
    if(oplogids[std::stoull((*v).data_[0])] == 0){
      kvMap[(*v).data_[2]] = (*v).data_[3];
      oplogids[std::stoull((*v).data_[0])] = 1;
    }
    Log_info("put done");
  }
  else if((*v).data_[1]=="get"){
    Log_info("in get");
    if(oplogids[std::stoull((*v).data_[0])] == 0){
      oplogids[std::stoull((*v).data_[0])] = 1;
    }
  }
  else if((*v).data_[1]=="append"){
    Log_info("in append");
    if(oplogids[std::stoull((*v).data_[0])] == 0){
      auto it = kvMap.find((*v).data_[2]);
      if (it != kvMap.end()) {
        kvMap[(*v).data_[2]] += (*v).data_[3];
      }
      else{
        kvMap[(*v).data_[2]] = (*v).data_[3];
      }
      oplogids[std::stoull((*v).data_[0])] = 1;
    }
  }
}

shared_ptr<KvClient> KvServer::CreateClient() {
  /* don't change this function */
  auto cli = make_shared<KvClient>();
  verify(commo_ != nullptr);
  cli->commo_ = commo_;
  uint32_t id = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  id = id << 16;
  cli->cli_id_ = id+cli_cnt_++; 
  return cli;
}

} // namespace janus;
